long_description: The Primus Polaris Power lantern floods your campsite with natural-looking light, and features a convenient USB port for charging electronics. 5 white LEDs output 180 lumens on high; 5 different levels let you choose just the right amount of light. Lantern operates on 4 D batteries, included; batteries provide up to 23 hrs. of use on high and 450 hrs. on low. Includes a USB port which allows you to charge a cell phone or other electronic device off of the lantern's batteries; use the cable that comes with your device. Hang the lantern up with the carabiner hook on the top.
short_description: The Primus Polaris Power lantern floods your campsite with natural-looking light, and features a convenient USB port for charging electronics.
